preqs: A first-year sequence in an Arts discipline or permission.

rules.ruleString: For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do Must have passed 24 (I/W) credit points at levels {1} Otherwise Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1%}

description: This unit explores current social issues in Australian society, the interconnections and relationships between them and how the array of cultural, social, political, economic, legal and media influences shape our considerations of social problems. Students are encouraged to reflect on, and challenge, their own values and beliefs through utilising concepts offered by contemporary social theory.
